bug.author: galrapo
bug.description: Hello, when I try to run pandas_profiling I get the following error: /anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pandas_profiling/pandas_profiling.mplstyle' not found in the style library and input is not a valid URL or path; see `style.available` for list of available styles my small piece of code which generates this error: df = pd.read_csv("strategies_data.csv") profile = pandas_profiling.ProfileReport(df) profile.to_file("strategies_EDA.html") Prior to uploading the package this kind of error did not occur.

comments.comment: removing the package and installing it back did solve the issue.
Update your pip version and try reinstalling the package again
can you tell how to remove the package?
What if uninstalling and re-installing does not work?
If you are inside a jupyter notebook, also make sure to restart the kernel. If the error then still persists, please report the version information (e.g. pip freeze).
